rationale: The agent's diff is functionally identical to the ground truth. Both remove the USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT feature flag from the exact same 5 files: the FeatureFlag enum definition in test/test-clusters/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/test/cluster/FeatureFlag.java and four test configuration files (SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java, ClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java, LogsdbTestSuiteIT.java, and CoreWithSecurityClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java). The only differences are in the shortened commit hashes shown in the diff headers (e.g., '2be870db' vs '2be870dbf4e'), which are cosmetic presentation differences and do not affect the actual code changes. The agent correctly identified all locations where the feature flag was used and removed them completely, matching the task requirements perfectly. No unsolicited documentation was added. The changes are minimal, targeted, and appropriate for a feature flag removal task.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java b/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
index 2be870dbf4e..df25624263a 100644
--- a/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
+++ b/qa/smoke-test-multinode/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/smoketest/SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
@@ -37,7 +37,6 @@ public class SmokeTestMultiNodeClientYamlTestSuiteIT extends ESClientYamlSuiteTe
         .feature(FeatureFlag.TIME_SERIES_MODE)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SUB_OBJECTS_AUTO_ENABLED)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.DOC_VALUES_SKIPPER)
-        .feature(FeatureFlag.USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.IVF_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SYNTHETIC_VECTORS)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.RERANK_SNIPPETS)
diff --git a/rest-api-spec/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/test/rest/ClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java b/rest-api-spec/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/test/rest/ClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
index 739b6fd755a..99d2c1bd54b 100644

+++ b/rest-api-spec/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/test/rest/ClientYamlTestSuiteIT.java
@@ -37,7 +37,6 @@ public class ClientYamlTestSuiteIT extends ESClientYamlSuiteTestCase {
         .feature(FeatureFlag.TIME_SERIES_MODE)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SUB_OBJECTS_AUTO_ENABLED)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.DOC_VALUES_SKIPPER)
-        .feature(FeatureFlag.USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.IVF_FORMAT)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.SYNTHETIC_VECTORS)
         .feature(FeatureFlag.RERANK_SNIPPETS)
diff --git a/test/test-clusters/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/test/cluster/FeatureFlag.java b/test/test-clusters/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/test/cluster/FeatureFlag.java
index 888c4afbf33..7bf32769e0d 100644
--- a/test/test-clusters/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/test/cluster/FeatureFlag.java
+++ b/test/test-clusters/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/test/cluster/FeatureFlag.java
@@ -19,7 +19,6 @@ public enum FeatureFlag {
     TIME_SERIES_MODE("es.index_mode_feature_flag_registered=true", Version.fromString("8.0.0"), null),
     SUB_OBJECTS_AUTO_ENABLED("es.sub_objects_auto_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("8.16.0"), null),
     DOC_VALUES_SKIPPER("es.doc_values_skipper_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("8.18.1"), null),
-    USE_LUCENE101_POSTINGS_FORMAT("es.use_lucene101_postings_format_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("9.1.0"), null),
     IVF_FORMAT("es.ivf_format_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("9.1.0"), null),
     LOGS_STREAM("es.logs_stream_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("9.1.0"), null),
     PATTERNED_TEXT("es.patterned_text_feature_flag_enabled=true", Version.fromString("9.1.0"), null),
diff --git a/x-pack/plugin/logsdb/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/logsdb/LogsdbTestSuiteIT.java b/x-pack/plugin/logsdb/src/yamlRestTest/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/logsdb/LogsdbTestSuiteIT.java

         .setting("xpack.security.autoconfiguration.enabled", "false")

         .feature(FeatureFlag.DOC_VALUES_SKIPPER)
